categories: Category:Conflicts of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: Around 3636 BBY, Emperor Valkorion sent his sons, Prince Arcann and Prince Thexan across the galaxy to conduct a series of raids to test the strength of the two dominant galactic governments: the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. The attacks were largely mysterious to the two entities.
After the assassination of Valkorion and the imprisonment of the Galactic War hero, simply known as the Commander, Arcann launched a full conquest of the galaxy.
